entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
